testcase.name: Writing to external file TestCase
testcase.system-out: * def util = Java.type("utils.BDDUtil") ................................... passed Given url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1" .................. passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def result = get response ............................................... passed * util.writeToFile("Karate19File.json", result); .......................... passed * def fileResponse = read('classpath:Karate19File.json') .................. passed * print fileResponse ...................................................... passed
